name: Pole Opposition
description:
Pole Opposition


As a proton, stability is important to you. Sometimes you just need that one special electron to be satisfied...

...and yet these rogue electrons wander around trying to bond with any proton in sight. Why can't they just leave you alone?


How To Play


Avoid the rogue electrons at all costs.
Use your orbiting electron to repel the rogue electrons.
Survive for as long as you can.
Repel electrons into each other for bonus points.

Arrow Keys Move Space Slow down rotation Enter Pause

Pole Opposition was made for Trijam #152. Thank you to everyone who played.

NOTE: The online leaderboard only works in the Windows version. Sorry, I discovered this at the very last-second :(
